definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: The packing possesses large specific pore volume, high column efficiency, wide separation range of molecular weight and long life time.
sentences.chinese: 該種填料孔容大，拄效高，分離範圍廣，使用壽命長。

sentences.english: A toughness cushion ring is arranged at the bottom of the threaded column on the jar lid.
sentences.chinese: 在壇蓋上螺紋拄的底部，有一韌性墊圈。

sentences.english: Not allowed to put weight on my leg for eight weeks, I wobbled about on crutches.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不讓受傷的腿承重，我拄柺杖拄了8個星期。

sentences.english: Not allowed to put weight on my leg for eight weeks, I wobbled about on crutches.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不讓受傷的腿承重，我拄柺杖拄了8個星期。

sentences.english: He entered walking easily and without crutches.
sentences.chinese: 他不拄柺杖，行動自如地走了進來。

sentences.english: He leaned an elbow on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他用一個胳膊肘拄桌子。

sentences.english: The driver wasn't paying attention when the car suddenly ploughed into a cement pole.
sentences.chinese: 司機注意力不集中，突然車子撞到一根水泥拄上。

sentences.english: The troll clambered to his feet, laughing, and retrieved his stick.
sentences.chinese: 這矮人從地上爬起來，大笑着，重新拿起他拄的棍子。

sentences.english: Grandpa a still walks without a stick.
He carried a stick in each hand and slung his box of colours over his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他一隻手拄一根柺杖，顏料箱掛在肩膀上。

sentences.english: just busted my heel, and I was on crutches for about a month.
sentences.chinese: 撞碎了腳後跟，拄了一個月的拐。

sentences.english: If you walk in on crutches, offer an explanation, but keep it light.
sentences.chinese: 如果你拄拐行走，解釋一下，但儘量低調一點。

sentences.english: This reverend person bore a staff which seemed to have been recently cut in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 這位牧師先生手拄一根似乎剛從林子裏砍下來的樹條。

sentences.english: I saw an old man hitching along on his stick.
sentences.chinese: 我看見一位老人拄著手杖蹣跚而行。

definition: to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]
to bow/to bend at the waist
to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
see 顫巍巍|颤巍巍[chan4 wei1 wei1]
